Workflow.Name: Admin | Excuse Non Inventoried Envts from Governance Flows
Workflow.Description: If you are only doing inventory for a subset of environments (not the default behavior) then this flow will ensure the ignored environments have their "excuse from" flags set correctly.

LocalizedName.description: Admin | Excuse Non Inventoried Envts from Governance Flows

Description.description: If you are only doing inventory for a subset of environments (not the default behavior) then this flow will ensure the ignored environments have their "excuse from" flags set correctly.
